Author: cartoonz0mbie
Text: I know it sucks. However, it is crucial that you do not push these women away. Eating disorders are isolating diseases. They cause you to push others away, especially those who care about you. Keep them close, even when it's hard. You don't want to wake up one day and realize that you've severed all ties and now you need to struggle with this all alone.

Author: violetblushxx
Text: That sucks, and is super frustrating. I'm sure it's just coming for a place of caring, but as an adult you do have the right to make your own choices. When I was at the worst with my ED my colleagues would question me all the time.. 'what have you brought for lunch/dinner?' 'Is that all you're having?'.. one literally offered to buy me a burger one day. I sure as hell wasn't skipping for the financial benefit, that one made me roll my eyes. In saying that, look after yourself! ‚ù§
